summary: A ghost returns back from his world to prove something. But on earth, he has something more to do for his country.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Boman Irani|Parth Bhalerao|Sanjay Mishra|Usha Nadkarni|Usha Jadhav|Anant Jog|Shankar Sachdev|Vijay Maurya|Subrat Dutta|Mukesh Bhatt|Kurush Deboo|Kamlesh Sawant|Ajay Jadhav|Farah Ahmed|Manoj Anand|Raj Awasti|Tina Bansal|Ashwani Chopra|Jasbir Chopra|Jas Dhillon|Dheerendra Dwivedi|Sandeep Garcha|Taj Gill|Monisha Hassen|Sharif Islam|Amrita Jazzmyn|Brijendra Kala|Ranbir Kapoor|Anurag Kashyap|Ashwin Kaushal|Shah Rukh Khan|Nina Kumar|Preet Kaur Madhan|A.R. Manikandan|Pete Nata|Kumud Pant|Sanjev Parma|Jayesh Patel|Rajen Prajapati|Simi Rai|Atul Sharma|Manuj Sharma|Rafique Tension
title: Bhoothnath Returns
